Player History
Drafted in 12th round, 182nd overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/5/2015...
Had first career hit on 4/16/2015, off George Davenport (SLB)...
Injured on 3/13/2016 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 4-5 weeks...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $840,000 through salary arbitration...
Was claimed off waivers by Philadelphia on 2/12/2017.
Was claimed off waivers by Kansas City on 3/11/2017.
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $840,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/22/2018 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Released by Kansas City on 10/3/2018...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 3/1/2019 to a minor league contract.
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 7/1/2019.
Released by Houston on 7/11/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 3/1/2020 to a minor league contract.
